Adds a new Transition to the PetriNet.

Arc - Class in classes
The Arc class models an arc in a Petri net, connecting a Place and a Transition with a specific weight.
Arc(int, Place, Transition) - Constructor for class classes.Arc
Constructor to initialize an Arc with a weight, a Place, and a Transition.
ArcDrain - Class in arcs
ArcDrain is a specialized ArcPT that removes all tokens from the connected Place when the transition fires.
ArcDrain(int, Place, Transition) - Constructor for class arcs.ArcDrain
Constructor to create an ArcDrain with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.
ArcPT - Class in arcs
ArcPT models an arc that goes from a Place to a Transition (Arc Place to Transition).
ArcPT(int, Place, Transition) - Constructor for class arcs.ArcPT
Constructor to create an ArcPT with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.
arcs - package arcs
 
ArcTP - Class in arcs
ArcTP models an arc that goes from a Transition to a Place (Arc Transition to Place).
ArcTP(int, Place, Transition) - Constructor for class arcs.ArcTP
Constructor to create an ArcTP with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.
ArcZero - Class in arcs
rcZero is a specialized ArcPT that fires only when the connected Place has zero tokens.
ArcZero(int, Place, Transition) - Constructor for class arcs.ArcZero
Constructor to create an ArcZero with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.
